name: NSTextFieldCell
desc: An object that enhances the text display capabilities of a cell.

items.name: init(textCell: String)
items.desc: Initializes a text field cell that displays the specified string.

items.name: init(coder: NSCoder)
items.desc: Initializes a text field cell from data in the provided unarchiver.

items.name: var textColor: NSColor?
items.desc: The color to use to draw the cell’s text.

items.name: var bezelStyle: NSTextField.BezelStyle
items.desc: The bezel style to use when drawing the text field.

items.name: enum NSTextField.BezelStyle
items.desc: The style of bezel the text field displays.

items.name: var backgroundColor: NSColor?
items.desc: The color of the cell’s background.

items.name: var drawsBackground: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the cell draws its background color.

items.name: func setUpFieldEditorAttributes(NSText) -> NSText
items.desc: Allows the cell to set up the field editor’s attributes before editing begins.

items.name: func setWantsNotificationForMarkedText(Bool)
items.desc: Directs the cell’s associated field editor to post text change notifications.

items.name: var placeholderString: String?
items.desc: The placeholder text for the cell, specified as a plain text string.

items.name: var placeholderAttributedString: NSAttributedString?
items.desc: The placeholder text for the cell, specified as an attributed string.

items.name: var allowedInputSourceLocales: [String]?
items.desc: An array of locale identifiers that represent the allowed input sources when the text field has the keyboard focus.
